data.title: The key to my happy marriage to Emma Thompson? Therapy
data.meta_description: The actor Greg Wise says speaking to a professional has helped him enhance his relationship, grieve for his sister and campaign for bereavement to put on the curriculum
data.text:
For some couples, it’s a regular date night. For others, the key to a happy marriage is never letting the sun set on an argument.

For Greg Wise and Dame Emma Thompson, it’s therapy. Wise says it has “definitely enhanced” the actors’ 21-year marriage — and he thinks it is vital for everybody else to do it too.

“I think, honestly, for everyone it is sort of essential,” he said. “But I think for us, for the lives that we lead, for the great amount of time that we spend apart, just for the work that we require … in terms of being actors, I think we absolutely have to have support all around that.

“Whether it saved our marriage … I don’t know if
